channel.title: This May be out of Reach
channel.description:
So, I've been working with hosting lately and I don't have a reseller =D (No money ftw).
Anyways, I was wondering if it'd be possible to hax parts or even just do it from scratch, A script that could create a new databse, new database user, and a few more things.
Is it possible to do that from an external script?

item.title: This May be out of Reach
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

We’ve already discussed, but I don’t have the root user

I think it’d need some hardcore hax.

Read full topic
item.source: This May be out of Reach
